product_name: SportHill Symmetry II Jacket - Women's - 2012 Overstock
long_description: Built to keep you comfortable in nasty winter weather, the women's SportHill Symmetry II jacket fends off light wind, rain and snow with warm fabric and a moisture-shedding finish. Breathable polyester microfiber shell is treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish that sheds the elements. Brushed polyester mesh lining wicks away moisture to keep your core warm and comfortable. Front zip has inner stormflap lined with fleece; zipper garage holds zipper pull and protects against chafing. Packable hood stows in collar. Vertical back vents provide temperature regulation. 2 on-seam, zip hand pockets hold the necessities and a hidden chest pocket stores small accessories. Adjustable elliptical hem with elastic shock cord exits in pockets; adjustable sleeve hems with internal winter warmer cuffs. Reflective piping on front raglan seams; reflective insets at center and reflective logos on left front and back. Relaxed, straight body fit; hem hits at high-hip. Overstock.
short_description: Built to keep you comfortable in nasty winter weather, the women's SportHill Symmetry II jacket fends off light wind, rain and snow with warm fabric and a moisture-shedding finish.
